long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the HokieSpa website looking like a Y2K bug waiting to happen?

If so, download this chrome extension to automatically replace the user interface of the HokieSpa website with a newer modern design.

This chrome extension was made to restyle the MAIN stylesheet for the website. However, many other pages have their own stylesheets which makes some other pages look off. If you would like to help fix some of these problems, or would like to report some other problems, please join the discord!

Discord: https://discord.gg/QW3zypg

Whats New???

Update 1.0

MASSIVE UPDATE!!!
I worked with the VT IT department to restyle the entirety of Hokie Spa. Unfortunatly, after working on the code for a while, they decided to not use my janky code (very understandable) and are pursuing another way of modernizing the website. But, this means I have a bunch more code to add onto the chrome extension!
